definition: Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: Despite the clouds, the Matterhorn still was a great piece of rock to look at.
sentences.chinese: 除了云朵外，马特宏峰看上去始终是块壮观的石头。

sentences.english: The Chinese show was magnificent. Our athletes were brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 中国的闭幕式非常恢宏壮观，我们的运动员们也优秀。

sentences.english: Battles between these mega carnivores must have been quite a spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 这些大家伙之间的争斗场面肯定相当壮观。

sentences.english: Come, join us in the magic of the Pacific and the pageantry of its people.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，请加入我们太平洋的奇幻世界和壮观的人群。

sentences.english: East Dongting Lake has been famous for its great size and beauty throughout Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 东洞庭湖在中国历史上一直以它的壮观和美丽著称。

sentences.english: Love speaks up louder, and immobility itself becomes spectacular.
sentences.chinese: 爱情要高声，静止本身要壮观。

sentences.english: It's a spectacular sight as the flamingos lift into the air.
sentences.chinese: 一群红鹳飞向空中，景象十分壮观。

sentences.english: With beautiful words of adoration to the Lord, the psalmist likens several attributes of God to the different wonders of nature.
sentences.chinese: 诗人用好几个自然界的壮观景像，来形容上帝的属性。

sentences.english: Among the most spectacular sights are the great sea-bird colonies.
sentences.chinese: 庞大的海鸟群是最壮观的景象之一。

sentences.english: The opening ceremony was a fine spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 开幕式典礼是个壮观的场面。

sentences.english: On the scale, compared to the mainland, it's more spectacular ancient Egyptian pyramid.
sentences.chinese: 论规模，它比大陆上的古埃及金字塔更为壮观。

sentences.english: Movie-goers can expect to see magnificent battle scenes in the upcoming film.
sentences.chinese: 观众将会在即将上映的电影看到壮观战斗场面。

sentences.english: Mountains. It is more beautiful and magnificent.
The numerous students with pink and blue raincoats made the view very magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 中小学生方阵里大家披着粉色和蓝色的雨衣格外壮观。

sentences.english: The huge treaty books were ready at last.
sentences.chinese: 蔚为壮观的条约文本终于准备完毕了。

definition: nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
